questions.question: What is your date of birth? [Open-ended]
What is your gender? [MCQ: 1. Male 2. Female]
What is the socio-economic status of your home? [Likert 1–6: 1 = Very low, 6 = Very high]

According to your culture, people, or physical features, you are or are recognized as: [MCQ: 1. Indigenous 2. Gypsy 3. Raizal from San Andres, Providencia and Santa Catalina Archipelago 4. Palenquero from San Basilio 5. Black, mulatto (Afro-descendant), Afro-Colombian 6. None of the above]
How many years of education did your parents receive? [Open-ended]
How many years of education did your parents receive? [Open-ended] Father?
How many years of education did your parents receive? [Open-ended] Mother?
In general, how satisfied are you with all aspects of your life? [Likert 0–10: 0 = Not satisfied, 10 = Totally satisfied]
How happy did you feel yesterday? [Likert 0–10: 0 = At no time, 10 = All the time]
How much did you laugh yesterday? [Likert 0–10: 0 = At no time, 10 = All the time]
Did you learn new or exciting things yesterday? [Likert 0–10: 0 = At no time, 10 = All the time]
How much did you enjoy the activities you did yesterday? [Likert 0–10: 0 = At no time, 10 = All the time]
How worried did you feel yesterday? [Likert 0–10: 0 = At no time, 10 = All the time]
How depressed did you feel yesterday? [Likert 0–10: 0 = At no time, 10 = All the time]
How angry did you feel yesterday? [Likert 0–10: 0 = At no time, 10 = All the time]
How much stress did you feel yesterday? [Likert 0–10: 0 = At no time, 10 = All the time]
How lonely or unsupported did you feel yesterday? [Likert 0–10: 0 = At no time, 10 = All the time]

Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 4, where 0 is never, 1 is 'almost never', 2 is 'sometimes', 3 is 'fairly often', and 4 is 'very often', how often you experienced the following feelings during the last month: [Likert 0–4]

question.id: Emotional Regulation Frequency - Upset by Unexpected Events

questions.question: Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 4, where 0 is never, 1 is 'almost never', 2 is 'sometimes', 3 is 'fairly often', and 4 is 'very often', how often you experienced the following feelings during the last month: [Likert 0–4] how often have you been upset because of something that happened unexpectedly?

question.id: Emotional Regulation Frequency - Unable to Control Important Things

questions.question: Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 4, where 0 is never, 1 is 'almost never', 2 is 'sometimes', 3 is 'fairly often', and 4 is 'very often', how often you experienced the following feelings during the last month: [Likert 0–4] how often have you felt that you were unable to control the important things in your life?

question.id: Emotional Regulation Frequency - Nervous and Stressed

questions.question: Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 4, where 0 is never, 1 is 'almost never', 2 is 'sometimes', 3 is 'fairly often', and 4 is 'very often', how often you experienced the following feelings during the last month: [Likert 0–4] how often have you felt nervous and stressed?

question.id: Emotional Regulation Frequency - Lacked Confidence Handling Problems

questions.question: Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 4, where 0 is never, 1 is 'almost never', 2 is 'sometimes', 3 is 'fairly often', and 4 is 'very often', how often you experienced the following feelings during the last month: [Likert 0–4] how often have you felt confident about your ability to handle your personal problems?

question.id: Emotional Regulation Frequency - Things Going Your Way

questions.question: Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 4, where 0 is never, 1 is 'almost never', 2 is 'sometimes', 3 is 'fairly often', and 4 is 'very often', how often you experienced the following feelings during the last month: [Likert 0–4] how often have you felt that things were going your way?

question.id: Emotional Regulation Frequency - Unable to Cope

questions.question: Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 4, where 0 is never, 1 is 'almost never', 2 is 'sometimes', 3 is 'fairly often', and 4 is 'very often', how often you experienced the following feelings during the last month: [Likert 0–4] how often have you found that you could not cope with all the things that you had to do?

question.id: Emotional Regulation Frequency - Irritated by Life

questions.question: Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 4, where 0 is never, 1 is 'almost never', 2 is 'sometimes', 3 is 'fairly often', and 4 is 'very often', how often you experienced the following feelings during the last month: [Likert 0–4] how often have you been able to control irritations in your life?

question.id: Emotional Regulation Frequency - On Top of Things

questions.question: Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 4, where 0 is never, 1 is 'almost never', 2 is 'sometimes', 3 is 'fairly often', and 4 is 'very often', how often you experienced the following feelings during the last month: [Likert 0–4] how often have you felt that you were on top of things?

question.id: Emotional Regulation Frequency - Angered by Uncontrollable Events

questions.question: Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 4, where 0 is never, 1 is 'almost never', 2 is 'sometimes', 3 is 'fairly often', and 4 is 'very often', how often you experienced the following feelings during the last month: [Likert 0–4] how often have you been angered because of things that happened that were outside of your control?

Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 4, where 0 is never, 1 is 'almost never', 2 is 'sometimes', 3 is 'fairly often', and 4 is 'very often', how often you experienced the following feelings during the last month: [Likert 0–4] how often have you felt difficulties were piling up so high that you could not overcome them?

Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 3, where 0 is 'Not at all', 1 is 'several days', 2 is 'more than half of the days', and 3 is 'Nearly every day'. Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? [Likert 0–3]

question.id: Anxiety Symptoms Frequency - Feeling Nervous or On Edge

questions.question: Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 3, where 0 is 'Not at all', 1 is 'several days', 2 is 'more than half of the days', and 3 is 'Nearly every day'. Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? [Likert 0–3] Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge

Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 3, where 0 is 'Not at all', 1 is 'several days', 2 is 'more than half of the days', and 3 is 'Nearly every day'. Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? [Likert 0–3] Not being able to stop or control worrying

Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 3, where 0 is 'Not at all', 1 is 'several days', 2 is 'more than half of the days', and 3 is 'Nearly every day'. Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? [Likert 0–3] Worrying too much about different things

Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 3, where 0 is 'Not at all', 1 is 'several days', 2 is 'more than half of the days', and 3 is 'Nearly every day'. Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? [Likert 0–3] Trouble relaxing

Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 3, where 0 is 'Not at all', 1 is 'several days', 2 is 'more than half of the days', and 3 is 'Nearly every day'. Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? [Likert 0–3] Being so restless that it is hard to sit still

Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 3, where 0 is 'Not at all', 1 is 'several days', 2 is 'more than half of the days', and 3 is 'Nearly every day'. Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? [Likert 0–3] Becoming easily annoyed or irritable

question.id: Anxiety Symptoms Frequency - Fear Something Awful Might Happen

questions.question: Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 3, where 0 is 'Not at all', 1 is 'several days', 2 is 'more than half of the days', and 3 is 'Nearly every day'. Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? [Likert 0–3] Feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen

Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 3, where 0 is 'Not at all', 1 is 'several days', 2 is 'more than half of the days', and 3 is 'Nearly every day'. Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems?

Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 3, where 0 is 'Not at all', 1 is 'several days', 2 is 'more than half of the days', and 3 is 'Nearly every day'. Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Little interest or pleasure in doing things

Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 3, where 0 is 'Not at all', 1 is 'several days', 2 is 'more than half of the days', and 3 is 'Nearly every day'. Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless

Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 3, where 0 is 'Not at all', 1 is 'several days', 2 is 'more than half of the days', and 3 is 'Nearly every day'. Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much

Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 3, where 0 is 'Not at all', 1 is 'several days', 2 is 'more than half of the days', and 3 is 'Nearly every day'. Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Feeling tired or having little energy

Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 3, where 0 is 'Not at all', 1 is 'several days', 2 is 'more than half of the days', and 3 is 'Nearly every day'. Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Poor appetite or overeating

question.id: Depressive Symptoms Frequency - Feelings of Worthlessness

questions.question: Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 3, where 0 is 'Not at all', 1 is 'several days', 2 is 'more than half of the days', and 3 is 'Nearly every day'. Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Feeling bad about yourself or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down

Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 3, where 0 is 'Not at all', 1 is 'several days', 2 is 'more than half of the days', and 3 is 'Nearly every day'. Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television

Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 3, where 0 is 'Not at all', 1 is 'several days', 2 is 'more than half of the days', and 3 is 'Nearly every day'. Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed. Or the opposite — being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual

Next, you will be asked questions about your emotional state. Please answer on a scale of 0 to 3, where 0 is 'Not at all', 1 is 'several days', 2 is 'more than half of the days', and 3 is 'Nearly every day'. Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems? Thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself
